title: Getting Started with Our Help Desk
content:
# Welcome to NextPhase IT Help Desk

This guide will help you get started with our help desk system.

## How to Submit a Ticket

1. Navigate to the dashboard
2. Click on "Submit New Request"
3. Fill out the form with your issue details
4. Attach any relevant files
5. Submit your request

## Tracking Your Tickets

You can track the status of your tickets in the "My Tickets" section. Tickets go through the following states:

- **Open**: Your ticket has been received
- **In Progress**: Our team is working on your issue
- **Resolved**: The issue has been fixed
- **Closed**: The ticket is complete

## Need Help?

If you need immediate assistance, you can also browse our knowledge base for common solutions.

title: Password Reset Instructions
content:
# How to Reset Your Password

If you've forgotten your password, follow these steps to reset it:

## Self-Service Password Reset

1. Go to the login page
2. Click "Forgot Password?"
3. Enter your email address
4. Check your email for reset instructions
5. Follow the link in the email
6. Create a new password

## Password Requirements

Your new password must:
- Be at least 8 characters long
- Include uppercase and lowercase letters
- Include at least one number
- Include at least one special character

## Still Having Issues?

If you're unable to reset your password using the self-service option, please submit a help desk ticket and our IT team will assist you.
